official_title: A bill designating the week of February 7, 1988, through February 13, 1988, as "National Crime Prevention Week" in honor of those individuals in the United States involved in the fight against crime.

summary.text: Designates the week of February 7 through February 13, 1988, as National Crime Prevention Week.
